name: Dead Tunnels - Horror Game
description:
Horror about the abandoned tunnels of the city, in which, as it turned out, a monster lives. You need to get out of the tunnels at all costs, but for this you have to do a few things

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move

Shift - Run

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Crouch

E - Interact

N - Notes

Esc - Pause
